}} 'Martin Mere' is a mere near Burscough, in Lancashire, England on the West
Lancashire Coastal Plain. The mere is a vast marsh, around that, until it was
drained, was the largest body of fresh water in England. Martin Mere:
Lancashire's Lost Lake, W. G. Hale and Audrey Coney. Liverpool: Liverpool
University Press, 2005.
